title: Advanced Algorithm Optimization
description: Comprehensive algorithm analysis and optimization with complexity analysis
prompt:
Analyze and optimize the following algorithm:

[PASTE CODE HERE]

Analysis Requirements:
1. Current State Analysis: Time complexity, space complexity, bottlenecks
2. Optimization Strategy: Algorithmic improvements, data structure alternatives
3. Optimized Implementation: Provide fully optimized code with comments
4. Complexity Comparison: Before and after analysis
5. Benchmarking: Test cases and performance comparison

Explain all trade-offs and improvements made.
example: Optimize a nested loop algorithm for finding duplicate elements in an array
